properties.entry: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_BIRTH, MEMBER_REGION, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_NT, MEMBER_PHONE, ENROLL_DT, ADMIN_FL, MEMBER_PROFILE, MEMBER_MESSAGE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND MEMBER_PW = ? AND SECESSION_FL = 'N'
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_REGION = ?, MEMBER_EMAIL = ?, MEMBER_PHONE = ?, MEMBER_PW = ?, MEMBER_NICKNAME = ? WHERE MEMBER_NO=? AND MEMBER_PW = ?
SELECT count(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND SECESSION_FL = 'N'
SELECT count(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NICKNAME = ? AND SECESSION_FL = 'N'
SELECT count(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = ? AND SECESSION_FL = 'N'
INSERT INTO MEMBER VALUES(SEQ_MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, NULL, NULL)
